title: MAG 095 - Absent Without Leave Transcript
text:
actually. 
BASIRA 
So, er… Do you want me to move? 
MARTIN 
No, no, I’m just about done. You keep reading. 
[Paper shuffling] 
MARTIN 
Not much else for us to do. 
[Tape clicks off] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro] 
JONATHAN SIMS
